mapper.insert: insert into file_upload(`id`, `name`, `path`, `related_id`,`type`,`user_id`,`domain`, `create_time`, `update_time`) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{path}, #{relatedId}, #{type},#{userId},#{domain}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update file_upload set name = #{name},path = #{path},related_id = #{relatedId},type = #{type}, update_time=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, name from file_upload order by name
select * from file_upload order by name
